page.title: 19 My Home in Wolverhampton
page.content: I live in Wednesfield. I have two sisters and two brothers and a mom and dad. We have four bed rooms,a living-room,dining-room and a kitchen. We have three doors,front,back,& french window. The living room has ceiling beams and white wallpaper.We have a red settee,two arm chairs,a fire-place and a red carpet. In the other room we have blue wallpaper,a cottage suite and an orange and brown carpet.The outside of my house is blue. Also we have a bath room.The bathroom colour is pink. We have a garden which is quite big. We have an apple tree.We have a dog called Sooty because he is black. Also he has a little bit of white on his paw.At the front of my house we have a garden with grass,small fir trees,roses,daisies and pansies. I like my house because it is in a good position. There is a school by me and a field to play football on.
